trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o método <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue(System.Object,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> provides all the information needed for a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to paint within an area based on the value of the specified object, including the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> in which the drawing should be done and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object with which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> fornece todas as informações necessárias para um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> para pintar dentro de uma área com base no valor do objeto especificado, incluindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> no qual o desenho deve ser feito e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> do objeto com o qual o desenho deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: The following code example method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> that provides the data needed to paint a representation of the value of an object within a given area:
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo método retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs> que fornece os dados necessários para pintar uma representação do valor de um objeto dentro de uma determinada área:

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: The context in which the value appears.
trans-unit.target: O contexto no qual o valor é exibido.

trans-unit.source: The value to paint.
trans-unit.target: O valor a pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object with which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> com o qual desenho deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> na qual desenho deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> class using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs" /> usando os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo que indica a área na qual deve ser feita a pintura.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que indica a área na qual deve ser feita a pintura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> interface to be used to gain additional information about the context this value appears in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> a ser usada para obter informações adicionais sobre o contexto em que esse valor aparece.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that indicates the context of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que indica o contexto do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object with which painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> com o qual deve ser feita a pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> objeto usada para pintura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor a pintar.

trans-unit.source: An object indicating what to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que indica que a pintura.
